mapper.insert: insert into boards (title, content, date, id) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{date}, #{id})
mapper.select: select board_num boardNum, title, content, date, id from boards
select board_num boardNum, title, content, date, id from boards where board_num like #{boardNum}
mapper.update: update boards set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, date = #{date}, id = #{id} where board_num like #{boardNum}
mapper.delete: delete from boards where board_num like #{boardNum}
